identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a 'Performance Pro' gaming dashboard that feels like a command center, not a spreadsheet.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix MMORPG aesthetics with Fintech precision.
Emotion First: The user should feel like a Guild Master managing an empire.
Content is King: Data density is crucial, but it must be scannable.
Contrast: High contrast for readability in dark mode.

usage.labels: font-secondary font-medium tracking-widest text-xs uppercase text-slate-500

Card.style: bg-mir-charcoal border border-white/5 rounded-xl shadow-xl overflow-hidden relative group

Button.primary: bg-mir-gold text-black font-bold uppercase tracking-wider hover:bg-amber-400 shadow-[0_0_10px_rgba(255,215,0,0.3)]
Button.secondary: bg-white/5 text-white border border-white/10 hover:bg-white/10 hover:border-white/20

setup: Install fonts via Google Fonts in index.css or layout.
Configure tailwind.config.js with the custom colors and fonts.
Set the global background to #0A0A0A and text to slate-200.
implementation_rules: Use the 'Bento Grid' layout for the dashboard summary.
Ensure all numbers (Gold, USD) use the 'JetBrains Mono' font for precision.
Use the 'Dragon' image as a subtle background overlay in the dashboard header (opacity 10-20%).
The 'Boss' counts should be visualized with small badges or progress bars if applicable.
Forms must feel 'tactile' - use clear borders and focus states.
Do NOT use standard Shadcn cards without customization. Apply the 'tech_border' and 'glassmorphism' styles.

anti_slop: Avoid generic gradients. Use solid, deep colors with subtle noise or borders.
Don't center everything. Use strong left alignment for data.
Add data-testid to all interactive elements.
accessibility: Ensure Gold text (#FFD700) is readable on Black. If not, darken it slightly or use a background badge.
Interactive elements must have a focus ring.
